segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Huang . It's a pleasure to meet you again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleased to see you . Welcome to our company . I hope you have a good day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Can I meet my colleagues ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , come with me . Hello , Michael , this is Steven . He will be part of your team .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Steven , welcome to join us !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been looking forward to meeting you . I am new to the working world and would appreciate your guidance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right . Just call me if you need anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as the other guys are still not in , I ’ ll introduce you to them later .
segments.speaker: S1
